content: funny axolotl this little buddy works up fairly quick using small amounts of yarn & minimal sewing for the gills & tail we will be working top to bottom and in the round unless noted otherwise materials/tools worsted weight yarn in your colors of choice safety eyes pair of 9mm eyes or whatever size is appropriate for the hook and yarn you choose fiberfill stuffing hook d/3 25mm you can use whatever size you desire providing that you cannot see your stuffing yarn needle stitch marker crochet terms/special stitches magic_ring magic_ring chain - chain st s stitch es slip_stitch
